mapper.insert: insert into Member_tb(memberid, name, password, email_id, email_domain, tel1, tel2, tel3) values(#{memberid}, #{name}, #{password}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3})
mapper.select: select id, name, password, email_id, email_domain, tel1, tel2, tel3, type, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date from Member_tb
mapper.update: update member_tb set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email_id = #{emailId}, email_domain = #{emailDomain}, tel1 = #{tel1}, tel2 = #{tel2}, tel3 = #{tel3} where memberid = #{memberid}
